page.title: 09THE OLD AND YOUNG
page.content: IT IS QUITE INTERESTING TO SEE HOW A 71 YEAR OLD LADY HAS AN ORDINARY DAY. I INTERVIEWED A LADY AND THIS IS HOW IT WENT... "I GET UP AT 9.30AM AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST OF KELLOGGÂ£S CORNFLAKES AND THEN GET DRESSED AND GO OUT SHOPPING, COMEBACK AND DO SOME HOUSEWORK AND HAVE MY LUNCH (WHICH IS A VERIETY OF THINGS) AFTER LUNCH I WATCH TELEVISION OR MAYBE GO OUT SOMEWERE.I COME HOME AND MAKE MY TEA,WHICH IS AGAIN A VERIETY OF THINGS. I WATCH SOME MORE TELEVISION AND GO TO BED ABOUT HALF PAST NINE."
